name: LD51: IT Hunts!
description:
Can you repair the generator before the alien lifeform hunts you down and devours you?

How to Play
  • Find, pickup, and return parts to the generator to repair it. Power toggles every 10s. 
  • Avoid the hunting Alien.  The alien lifeform is stunned when the power is on. 
  • Mouse click to crouch. 
  • Numerals to adjust mouse sensitivity (1 lower - 9 higher). 
  • Left Shift to capture or release mouse. 
  • Rotate with Mouse. 
  • Arrows or WASD to move.
